recipe.name: Guacamole Dressing
recipe.notes: So, like, I had this in my back pocket for a -long- time, believing it the whole while a damned -lie-.  It certainly could not be any good.Well, Hilary who usually will only politely consume my various experiments in dressing actually went back for SECONDS!  In the same sitting!
recipe.preparation: Rub a bowl with the garlic and the mash avocados in engarlicked bowl.  Mix onion, tomato, chiles, salt and mayonnaise to a smooth, sauce-like consistency.  Chill and serve.
recipe.source_name: From "Sharing Our Favorites: the Dana Guild, Senshin Buddhist Church, Los Angeles, CA" -- Lily Domoto
